channel.title: To make npcs stay there?
channel.description:
ok please read everything throughly, ok i need to spawn npc's places but make them stay there and stay stuff please give code, after this please tell me the code to spawn mosters or is it the same :confused:
p.s. im making my own server source thats why :P

item.title: To make npcs stay there?
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

[quote=“NojTB, post:3, topic:92701”]if ur in rush and ya allready got admin account and server able to be walked it just walk around go ::npc #
and then edit the autospawn.cgf new monsters. its hat i do when i am placing about 30 npcs all nearby each other or in a trail.[/quote]

that works but sometimes doing that can cause server to crash

Read full topic

item.title: To make npcs stay there?
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

to make npc/monsters spawn places, u gotta just do it in autospawn.cfg, once u filled out the first x and y coordinates, u gotta either put 0 as all the other coordinates, OR u can put the same coordinates in, now do this with monsters, bascaily, they should stay there unless somebody attacks them…

Read full topic
